name: The Fire And The Beast
description: The Fire And The Beast is a game with the main character: Peter Daniels. The detective.  As of right now this game is a demo/Pre-Pre Alpha ;) so there isn't very much to say about the game itself other than it has 3 places. Violl's Garden, Roselake and Dialite's Rest. The Dialites are an enemy species coming to the Alpha of the game. The demo is very short though. I would recommend to explore the maps.
